entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 07:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow or freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain showers and freezing rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
